Package com.irurueta.units

Class AngleConverter

java.lang.Object
com.irurueta.units.AngleConverter
public class AngleConverter extends Object
Does angle conversions to different units. To prevent loss of accuracy, conversion should only be done as a final step before displaying angle measurements.

  • Field Summary

    • toDegreesAndMinutes

      public static void toDegreesAndMinutes(double value, AngleUnit unit, double[] result)
      Converts provided angle value and unit to integer degrees and decimal minutes.
      Parameters:
      value - angle value to be converted from.
      unit - angle unit to be converted from.
      result - array where computed degrees and minutes will be stored.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if provided array does not have length 2.

      unit - angle unit to be converted from.

    • fromDegreesMinutesAndSeconds

      public static double fromDegreesMinutesAndSeconds(int degrees, int minutes, double seconds, AngleUnit resultUnit)
      Gets decimal degrees from provided integer degrees, integer minutes and decimal seconds.
      Parameters:
      degrees - integer degrees.
      minutes - integer minutes.
      seconds - decimal seconds.
      resultUnit - unit of returned value.
      Returns:
      decimal degrees.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if minutes or seconds are negative.

    • fromDegreesMinutesAndSeconds

      public static void fromDegreesMinutesAndSeconds(int degrees, int minutes, double seconds, Angle result)
      Gets decimal degrees from provided integer degrees, integer minutes and decimal seconds and sets the value into provided angle instance.
      Parameters:
      degrees - integer degrees.
      minutes - integer minutes.
      seconds - decimal seconds.
      result - instance where angle value and unit will be stored.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if minutes or seconds are negative.
